column4: Hello everyone, I'm not sure if this is the best place to ask this... but... I just installed gnome3 on ubuntu 11.04, however, when I attempt to log in I always get a "could not update /home/tom/.ICEAuthority.  I've checked to make sure that my user and it's group is the owner (and they are) what else could be wrong?
This is a great place to ask this :)
Oh, good point, haha. Still might get away with it, just be super-patient since there's no obligation to help ;p
But as LjL said, have you tried rebooting?
